plugin.name: OpenAI SEO Completion
plugin.description: OpenAI SEO Completion for generating SEO information in the content editor
open-ai-seo-completion.custom-field.desc: SEO info field with Open AI completion
open-ai-seo-completion.field-picker.desc: Select the field with the main content of the page
open-ai-seo-completion.errors.no-context: There is no content field selected, so no SEO information can be generated. Make sure there is a minimum of one 'rich text' field selected in the field picker on the right side of this page.
